name: Airbus Group SE
membership: Aerospace and Defence Industries Association of Europe (ASD), European Organisation for Security (EOS), Cercle des Délégués Permanents Français (CDPF), Kangaroo Group, European Satellite Operators Association (ESOA), NEREUS, ERSC, Eurospace, AFEP, AMSA2, AVISA, EBIT, BBE
goal:
European Aeronautic Defence and Space Companie EADS has adopted the name of Airbus Group since 2014.

Airbus Group is a global leader in aerospace, defence and related services. The group includes aircraft/helicopter manufacturers Airbus, Airbus Helicopters, and Airbus Defence & Space, provider of security and defence solutions and builder of space platforms.
interests: Budget, Competition, Development, Enterprise, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Transatlantic issues (WTO), Research and Technology (H2020), Aeronautics (EASA, etc.), space (Galileo, Kopernicus, etc.), security (cybersecurity), defence (prepatory action on research, EDIDP), company law (EMIR)
